page.title: 20Housing /Transport
page.content: There are five farms in the block each with their own farmhouse, but the main type of housing is small to medium sized owner occupied. These are mostly bungalows, which have been built in the last twenty years, although there are some two storey homes, most of them built just before or after the Second World War. There are also small number of houses built by the Local Authority. Apart from these there are a few larger properties built during Victorian times and situated along the main A47 King's Lynn to Norwich road. Recently there has been a great deal of local concern about the amount of traffic, particularly heavy lorries, passing through the village. Consequently a bypass committee with Middleton has been set up. However some local traders oppose the idea.
